# MAD9145 Assignments

# Research & Planning (30%)

UX and UI Deliverables
  1. Team Identity - Draft Week 1, Due Week 2
  2. Client Responses - Draft Week 1, Due Week 2
  3. User Research - Draft Week 2, Due Week 3
  4. Product Research - Draft Week 2, Due Week 3
  5. Personas - Draft Week 2, Due Week 3
  6. Usage Scenarios - Draft Week 3, Due Week 4
  7. Information Architecture - Draft Week 4, Due Week 5
  8. Paper Prototypes - Draft Week 4, Due Week 5
Development Deliverables
  1. Data Structures - Draft Week 4, Due Week 5
  2. High Level Architecture - Draft Week 3, Due Week 4
  3. Research and Proof of Concept List - Draft Week 3

# Design & Prototyping (20%)

UX and UI Deliverables
  1. UI Wireframes - Draft Week 5, Due Week 6
  2. Visual Design - Draft Week 5, Due Week 6
  3. Interactive Visual MockUp - Due before Reading Week
  4. Client Midterm Survey - Will be completed by client after your Interactive Visual Mockup
  5. Client Midterm Presentation - Partly in class, partly with client.
Development Deliverables
  1. Required Features and Platforms - Due before Reading Week.
  2. Technology Research Results - Due before Reading Week.

# Development & Testing (20%)

UX and UI Deliverables
  1. Usability Testing Documentations - Draft Week 7, Due Week 8
  2. Usability Testing Results - Draft Week 8, Due Week 9
